resources.string: Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.

string-array.name: categ_details
string-array.item:
One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well. 


						 Virginia Woolf, A Room of One's Own

First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you. 


						 Scott Fitzgerald

Life has but one true charm: the charm of the game. But what if we’re indifferent to whether we win or lose? 


						 Charles Baudelaire

Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window 


						 Steve Wozniak

Movie without romance feels like food without flavor. 


						 Toba Beta, Master of Stupidity

Love art in yourself, and not yourself in art. 


						 Konstantin Stanislavski, My Life In Art

The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page. 


						 Augustine of Hippo

A woman who cuts her hair is about to change her life. 


						 Coco Chanel

So many books, so little time. 


						 Frank Zappa

As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be? 


						 Cassandra Clare, City of Ashes

resources.string:
When you are notified, you must look around you for our cool stickers.

 Tap the Big Camera Button on the Main Screen to do just that.

 We don’t want to spam you, so if you are not interested in one of our products categories, you can unselect them.
In the Settings section you can set the time when you want to be notified, week days or weekend, also the hours.\n\n Here, you can log out from Facebook.
If you found a sticker searching with the camera, you need to feed our little hungry cameleon with the item, in order to collect it.

In the Side Menu, in the Collected section, you can see all the stickers that you found and details about them.

 Here, also you can view the Bar Code, show it to the store and then get the discount.

 In the Archived section you can see the history of your achivements: all the stickers you have collected since you firs installed the app.

 Attention! Each discount is only available until the expiration date showed in the Collected section!
To help us grow and provide cooler offers for you, share our app with a friend from Invite a friend section.
Add Geofences: Failure, error code %1$d GeofenceRequestIds=%2$s
Can\'t add geofences, previous request hasn\'t finished.
Invalid latitude(s). Must be in the range -90 to 90 degrees
Invalid longitude(s). Must be in the range -180 to 180 degrees
Invalid radius(s). Must be 1 meter or greater.
Geofence transition error. Invalid type %1$d in geofences %2$s
Invalid action received. See error log for details.
Latitude should be in the range -90 to 90 degrees
Longitude should be in the range -180 to 180 degrees
Google Play services: unable to resolve connection error.
Radius must be greater than or equal to 0
Removing geofences by request id failed: error code %1$d GeofenceRequestIds=%2$s
Can\'t remove geofences, previous request hasn\'t finished.
Removing geofences by request ids succeeded: request ids: %1$s
Removing all geofences failed: error code %1$d
Received an unknown activity request code %1$d in onActivityResult.
